interface.name: hdr_surface
interface.description: An extension interface to the wl_surface object to set the HDR static metadata associated with the surface.

request.name: set_metadata

description.summary: set the HDR static metadata for a surface

request.description: Set the HDR static metadata for the associated wl_surface. The HDR static metadata state is double buffered and will be applied on the next wl_surface::commit.

request.name: destroy
request.description: Destroying this object, destroys the HDR metadata associated with the surface and the surface will be considered as an SDR surface from the next wl_surface::commit.
